Posts.Content: Jun 18, 2010 04:19AM pat1154 wrote: Hi Traci, I know that to tell you not to worry doesn't mean much,but believe me I was right where you are 2 months ago. I had a stereo tactic biopsy and really no pain at all,I'm also small 125 lb and a size B cup.On Tuesday I had a lumpectomy and awaiting final path results. I know is a "roller-coaster" from which it seems we can't get off.....I too cry a lot,been prescribed xanax,with each new day I find that the fear was actually worse than the event. For now focus on the fact that 80% of these results are B9. Wishing you all the best. Pat
Posts.Title: Devastated...Magnified Mammogram shows Microcalcifications tracihogg shelleydodt
